Package de.hshl.obj.loader.objects

Class TriangleObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.loader.objects.TriangleObject
  • public class TriangleObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a name and multiple TriangleSurfaces. Support converting from OBJ representation to OpenGL friendly data.
    Author:
    Johannes Vollmer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.lang.String name
      The name this object or group was called in the OBJ file
      java.util.List<TriangleSurface> surfaces
      The object may be divided into several triangle surfaces, where each TriangleSurface has a single Material.

    • Method Detail

      • extract

        public static java.util.List<TriangleObject> extract​(TriangularOBJBuilder obj,
                                                     boolean indexing)
        Convert from an OBJ data layout to OpenGL friendly layout. If materials were loaded, extracts only faces that had materials, otherwise loads everything into a single Surface. If structures were loaded, extracts only faces out of objects or groups, otherwise the whole file is put into a single object. While OBJ groups will be returned in the order they appeared in the file, groups will not necessarily appear in their original order. All objects are independent from each other because any vertex indices will be local per TriangleMesh.
        Parameters:
        obj - The OBJ data to transform.
        indexing - If true, the meshes will be indexed.
        Returns:
        A list of all objects in the OBJ file.

      • extractObjects

        public static java.util.List<TriangleObject> extractObjects​(TriangularOBJBuilder obj,
                                                            boolean indexing)
        Parameters:
        obj - Source of extraction.
        indexing - Produce indexed meshes.
        Returns:
        Extracted objects but not groups, using materials if they were loaded.

      • extractGroups

        public static java.util.List<TriangleObject> extractGroups​(TriangularOBJBuilder obj,
                                                           boolean indexing)
        Parameters:
        obj - Source of extraction.
        indexing - Produce indexed meshes.
        Returns:
        Extracted groups but not objects, using materials if they were loaded. Groups will not keep the order they appeared in the file.

      • extractUnstructured

        public static TriangleObject extractUnstructured​(TriangularOBJBuilder obj,
                                                 boolean indexing)
        Parameters:
        obj - Source of extraction.
        indexing - Produce indexed meshes.
        Returns:
        All data as a single object, using materials if they were loaded.

      • extractObjectsWithMaterials

        public static java.util.List<TriangleObject> extractObjectsWithMaterials​(TriangularOBJBuilder obj,
                                                                         boolean indexing)
        Parameters:
        obj - Source of extraction.
        indexing - Produce indexed meshes.
        Returns:
        Extracted objects, split meshes where materials are switched.

      • extractObjectsWithoutMaterials

        public static java.util.List<TriangleObject> extractObjectsWithoutMaterials​(TriangularOBJBuilder obj,
                                                                            boolean indexing)
        Parameters:
        obj - Source of extraction.
        indexing - Produce indexed meshes.
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        indexing - Produce indexed meshes.
        Returns:
